title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Web 2.0-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute collaborative projects analyzing social issues using Web 2.0 tools.
Learners can iteratively improve learning content through peer assessment and feedback based on constructivist approaches.
Learners can effectively apply collective knowledge generated across digital platforms to solve social problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
